bioconda.name: bioconductor-eudysbiome
bioconda.summary: Cartesian plot and contingency test on 16S Microbial data

biotools.summary: Package to annotate the differential genera as harmful/harmless based on their ability to contribute to host diseases or as unknown based on their ambiguous genus classification. It measures the eubiotic (harmless genera increase or harmful genera decrease) or dysbiotic(harmless genera decrease or harmful genera increase) impact of a given treatment or environmental change on the (gut-intestinal, GI) microbiome in comparison to the microbiome of the reference condition.

bioschemas.name: eudysbiome
bioschemas.summary: Package to annotate the differential genera as harmful/harmless based on their ability to contribute to host diseases or as unknown based on their ambiguous genus classification. It measures the eubiotic (harmless genera increase or harmful genera decrease) or dysbiotic(harmless genera decrease or harmful genera increase) impact of a given treatment or environmental change on the (gut-intestinal, GI) microbiome in comparison to the microbiome of the reference condition.
